actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the rates and income limitations for payments of pensions to veterans and their widows.

summary.text: Increases the rates and income limitations for the payment of pensions to veterans and their widows. Allows a cost-of-living increase in such rates, based on such increase for social security recipients.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the rates and income limitations for payments of pensions to veterans and their widows.
